subject: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE Ug
body:
FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE Uganda REPUBLIC
Address: Rue Du Governor Baylor, Uganda Republic
E-mail: 
ministryo492@seznam.cz
Attention: Dear Beneficiary of this contract:
We apologize for the delay of your payment valued $10,500,000.00,the delay was caused unnecessarily but we have obtained irrevocable payment guarantee from the Federal High Court of Justice,Uganda Republic to restrict illusions.Your approved fund sum of $10,500,000.00 is still in the bank but according to International Banking Ethics,at expiration of two(2) years the money will revert to Uganda Republic Government Ownership if nobody apply for claim.
The International Monetary Fund (IMF) approved the payment so do not fear to receive your fund and it was stipulated that ATM VISA CARD will be issue to you.The ATM VISA CARD will enable you to withdraw/transfer the fund approved in your favor without hitch and the $10,500,000.00 will be paid to you completely.Thus,you will receive ATM VISA CARD sum of $10,500,000.00 from our paying bank but 
you are required to provide below information for the ATM VISA CARD activation;
Full Name..............................................
Home Address.............................................
Country....................................................
Phone Number.................................................
Occupation/Profession..........................................
Valid Identification Card
........................................
Amount required for the fee is: $100.00
…....….....…..….........
Method of payment: Gift card/BTC-Bitcoins
..
The approved $10,500,000.00 will be paid to you accordingly therefore check your email always for our updates & instructions to avoid further delaying.Also be conscious of deceit emails otherwise you make yourself vulnerable to fraud.Hence Federal Ministry of Finance,Uganda Republic is not responsible for fraud so control your impulsion to avoid exploitation.
Yours Sincerely,
Mr. Hung Chizqguata
Director Foreign Fund Remittance
Federal Ministry of Finance Uganda Republic (
ministryo492@seznam.cz
)

subject: Re: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE Ug
body:
Hello Mr. Hung Chizqguata,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this situation with the Federal Ministry of Finance in Uganda Republic.

I'm curious, how did my name come up in relation to this unclaimed fund? Also, could you please explain more about the process of activating the ATM VISA CARD?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven
